document_data.name: Tower of the Morning
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of the Morning''' was an important temple to [[Lathander]].
document_data.Location: The tower was located in [[Telpir]], a free city on the [[Dragon Coast]].
document_data.Structure: Though structurally far more simple than the [[Spires of the Morning]], this temple was considered the second-most prominent temple to the Morninglord.
document_data.History: As of [[1369 DR]], High Radiance [[Durneth Seafarer]] was in command of the tower. In [[1374 DR]], Durneth was still in charge. In [[Ches 28]] of this year, edicts were issued at the tower that gave merit to the [[Risen Sun heresy]].
